data.2: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
data.3: Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border for the crust.
data.4: Place the fresh mozzarella slices over the sauce.
data.5: Drizzle olive oil over the top and sprinkle with a pinch of salt and black pepper.
data.6: Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling.
data.7: Once baked, remove the pizza from the oven and top with fresh basil (or your spinach/arugula alternative).
